comment.author: 8822983@N08
comment._content: Strelow is mentioned in the Courier Mail report of the 1939 QLD Championships. trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/40858714?searchTerm=Axeman A. F. Strelow &searchLimits= Strelow has a nice style for the standing block, although the nearside scarf hasn't been properly cleared before change over and the town shoes are a bit risky; as is the pre-war practice of nailing the competition block to the top of a dummy log.

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/merryjack] Thanks for finding this bit of information on A.F.Strelow on Trove!
